verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus, Saviour, all I have is Thine, Body, soul and will I now resign. Make me, keep me faithful unto Thee, Jesus, Saviour, through eternity.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus, Saviour, I would die to sin, Come, oh come and live in me again. Mold me, fill me till the world shall see Jesus, Saviour, living now in me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Jesus, Saviour, in this quiet hour, May I feel Thy Spirit's strength and power; Take me, use me as Thou wilt each day, Jesus, Saviour, this I humbly pray.
